North_Las_Vegas.X-Scream:
X-Scream is, at a height of approximately 866 feet (264 m), the world's third highest amusement ride, located on top of the Stratosphere Las Vegas. The name of the ride is a play on the word extreme.


== Ride experience ==
X-Scream is a ride comprising a 68 ft (21 m) straight piece of track similar to that of a conventional roller coaster, which carries a single open top car.
